name: Ronald Laren

topics.topic_text: Do you know someone named Grady?
topics.response_text: Grady? Maybe. Why you asking?

topics.topic_text: I have a package for you from him.
topics.response_text: Holy crap! You have it?

topics.topic_text: I found him dead.
topics.response_text: Holy crap! That son-of-a-bitch took my caps and ran and now he ends up dead?

topics.topic_text: I bumped into him a while back is all. (Lie)
topics.response_text: You did huh? Well, if you ever see that lowlife again, tell him Ronald wants his damn package delivered or bring me back my caps.

topics.topic_text: Sure, here you go.
topics.response_text: Hey, thanks a bunch for bringing it to me. You could have been a jerk and sold it to someone else, but you didn't.

topics.topic_text: Sure, here you go and you don't owe me a single cap.
topics.response_text: Well, that's awfully generous of you seeing as I never made a deal with you in the first place.

topics.topic_text: I'll sell it to you...for 300 caps.
topics.response_text: Fine, fine. Anything to get it! Here's your caps, now hand it over.

topics.topic_text: Hang on a second. You want it, you need to pay for it.
topics.response_text: Shrewd kid, very shrewd.

topics.topic_text: I'm not giving you anything.
topics.response_text: Ohhh... I know how this game's played, kid.

topics.topic_text: Nope, sorry. I'm holding onto it.
topics.response_text: Fine, be an asshole. When you get hungry for caps, you know who to talk to.

topics.topic_text: GREETING
topics.response_text: Lemme go, beautiful! I'm gonna' get us some Quantum!

topics.topic_text: Is there anything else interesting to see near Girdershade?
topics.response_text: My friend, you are at the ass end of the Capital Wasteland. If it weren't for Sierra I'd be out of here.

topics.topic_text: I have some more Quantum for you.
topics.response_text: Why would I want that piss water? Get it away from me.

topics.topic_text: Sierra is dead.
topics.response_text: What? What the hell happened?

topics.topic_text: The Nuka-Cola Corporation had her killed! (Lie)
topics.response_text: Crap! This has to be about the Nuka-Cola machine I got for her!

topics.topic_text: Sorry, I don't know. (Lie)
topics.response_text: Are you shittin' me? What a waste! Oh man.

topics.topic_text: I killed her. Got a problem with that, tough guy?
topics.response_text: What?? You're crazy! How could you just go and kill her like that?!

topics.topic_text: You sound like you were in love with her.
topics.response_text: Love? What are you talking about.

topics.topic_text: Yeah, it's a shame. She was beautiful.
topics.response_text: Wasn't she?

topics.topic_text: Well, you found me. Now try and kill me, tough guy.
topics.response_text: You!? You killed her!?

topics.topic_text: What's it to you?
topics.response_text: Because I'm making sure that no one messes with her. She's my girl, you know.

topics.topic_text: I was checking out Sierra's Nuka-Cola Collection.
topics.response_text: That better be all you were checking out. I don't like guys messing with my woman.

topics.topic_text: Screw you, buddy! What are you, her husband?
topics.response_text: Nope. I'm not the marrying type.

topics.topic_text: She never said anything about you two being together.
topics.response_text: Well, that's likely because it's none of anyone's business but ours.

topics.topic_text: I'm not messing with anything.
topics.response_text: Good. I aim to keep it that way.

topics.topic_text: Hey, she's my girl! Take a number!
topics.response_text: I think you'd better calm down and think long and hard about that.

topics.topic_text: What are you driving at?
topics.response_text: Wow, you are as naive as you look.

topics.topic_text: I don't have time for this nonsense.
topics.response_text: All right, suit yourself.

topics.topic_text: What the hell is wrong with you? You're sick...
topics.response_text: Born and raised that way and damn proud of it.

topics.topic_text: Nope, I still don't get it.
topics.response_text: New to this stuff, eh kid?

topics.topic_text: That's disgusting!
topics.response_text: What are you, some kind of choir boy? Bah, maybe you're just not old enough to understand yet.

topics.topic_text: Can't say I blame you.
topics.response_text: Now you're speaking my language.

topics.topic_text: Oh, really? Sounds interesting. Go on...
topics.response_text: I know she's asked you to find her some Nuka-Cola Quantum. Heck, she asks everyone that wanders through here.

topics.topic_text: Just what is it you need me to do?
topics.response_text: I know she's asked you to find her some Nuka-Cola Quantum. Heck, she asks everyone that wanders through here.

topics.topic_text: Look, I've got things to do. I'm not interested.
topics.response_text: Fine. Oh, and I wouldn't bother running back to Sierra and warning her about our little chat. She won't even understand what you're talking about.

topics.topic_text: Yeah, sure. I'm always for making more caps.
topics.response_text: Thought you might. Good. I'll see you soon then.

topics.topic_text: Tell you what, handsome. Find me some Quantum and we'll make it a threesome.
topics.response_text: Holy shit! Are you for real? Hell yeah!

topics.topic_text: Sorry, I'm not interested in your offer.
topics.response_text: Well, look... don't answer me now, just keep it in mind. If you find some and you've had a change of heart, I'll still  buy 'em.

topics.topic_text: How about you pay me double for each Quantum bottle.
topics.response_text: You devious bastard. I didn't figure you were that clever.

topics.topic_text: Is there anything else interesting to see near Girdershade?
topics.response_text: My friend, you are at the ass end of the Capital Wasteland. If it weren't for Sierra I'd be out of here.

topics.topic_text: What do you know about the Nuka-Cola Bottling Facility?
topics.response_text: Well, Sierra may be as nutty as a fruitcake, but she's right.

topics.topic_text: What do you know about Nuka-Cola Quantum?
topics.response_text: That stuff is some of the nastiest shit I've ever had.

topics.topic_text: Here's all the Nuka-Cola Quantum I'm carrying.
topics.response_text: Sorry, don't want anymore. Thirty was all I needed... and now Sierra's mine.

topics.topic_text: SpeechChallengeFailure
topics.response_text: No, I don't think so. Take what you can get.

conversation.response_text: Sorry, darling. I'm on a mission of mercy... for me!
Yep. I'll be seeing you, soon I hope.

description:
Ronald Laren is a 52 year-old Caucasian Male.

A lonely widower and skilled fighter who lives in Girdershade with Sierra Petrovita. He has developed feelings for Sierra due to their proximity, but she remains oblivious to his advances as she's focused on collecting Nuka-Cola.

Ronald Laren's Personality: Lonely, frustrated, and somewhat obsessive. Ronald is desperate for companionship and physical intimacy after losing his wife. He has a short temper when rejected and can be spiteful, though he avoids physical violence against those who reject him.

Ronald Laren's Backstory: Ronald Laren was once happily married, but after his wife's death, he wandered the Capital Wasteland for years before settling in Girdershade. The isolation of living with only Sierra Petrovita as company has intensified his loneliness and longing for the physical intimacy he once shared with his wife. Despite being a skilled fighter who has defended Girdershade from raiders, his advances toward Sierra have been consistently rejected, leaving him bitter and resentful.
